meanings.definition: A South Asian dish made with highly seasoned rice and meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked delicious biryani for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant down the street serves the best biryani in town.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled biryani on my shirt, but it smelled so good!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of biryani filled the entire house, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The biryani at the party was so flavorful, I couldn't stop eating.

meanings.definition: A type of Indian cuisine known for its flavorful and aromatic rice dishes.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, we always enjoy a variety of biryani dishes.
meanings.sent2: The chef at the Indian restaurant specializes in making biryani.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of swimming in a pool filled with biryani - what a delicious dream!
meanings.sent4: The colors of the spices in the biryani dish created a beautiful palette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of biryani cooking in the kitchen made my mouth water.
